name: WorkFlow (Pignomaster)
description:
WorkFlow is a "fast fingers" little scoring game. You are a developer and have a limited time to increase the value of your project, as much as possible. But watch out of bugs !

It was inspired by the theme of Trijam 134 - We're heading for a disaster (but not submitted in time)

The goal is simple : Type randomly on your keyboard to increase the value of the project. But careful ! It will also increase the amount of bugs, and if there are too much of them => you lose. So switch to debug mode with TAB or SPACE then type again on your keyboard to decrease this amount (but you won't add value to your project anymore).

Commands

  • Accepted Keys for typing : Every letters (highlighted in-game)
  • Switch between Code/Debug : TAB or SPACE
  • Tutorial : Mouse click (right or left)

Made by

Louis 'Pignomaster' Vidal 

Credits
